recipes.title: Pasta Aglio e Olio
recipes.instructions: 1. Boil pasta. 2. Sauté garlic and flakes in oil. 3. Toss together.

recipes.title: Honey Garlic Chicken
recipes.instructions: 1. Brown chicken. 2. Add garlic, honey, and soy. 3. Simmer until glazed.

recipes.title: Classic Beef Tacos
recipes.instructions: 1. Brown beef with cumin. 2. Warm shells. 3. Fill shells with beef and toppings.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.instructions: 1. Chop vegetables. 2. Combine in a bowl. 3. Toss with olive oil and oregano.

recipes.title: Caprese Toast
recipes.instructions: 1. Toast bread. 2. Layer cheese and tomato. 3. Top with basil and glaze.

recipes.title: Egg Fried Rice
recipes.instructions: 1. Scramble eggs. 2. Stir-fry rice and peas. 3. Mix eggs back in with soy sauce.

recipes.title: Lemon Garlic Salmon
recipes.instructions: 1. Season salmon. 2. Pan-sear in butter and garlic. 3. Squeeze lemon over top.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.instructions: 1. Toast bread. 2. Mash avocado with lemon and salt. 3. Spread on toast.

recipes.title: Margherita Pizza
recipes.instructions: 1. Spread sauce on dough. 2. Top with cheese. 3. Bake at 450°F and add basil.

recipes.title: Chickpea Curry
recipes.instructions: 1. Sauté onion. 2. Add spices, chickpeas, and milk. 3. Simmer and stir in spinach.

recipes.title: Pesto Pasta
recipes.instructions: 1. Boil pasta. 2. Reserve some water and drain. 3. Mix pasta with pesto.

recipes.title: Black Bean Quesadilla
recipes.instructions: 1. Place cheese and beans on tortilla. 2. Fold and grill until melted. 3. Slice and serve.
